description: Mini-test and mock exam templates for ACCA FA used by Outcomeo's AI tutor. Structural blueprints covering all 30 units.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 1 – Foundations & Recording
mini_tests.format: MCQ-only, mixed conceptual and simple numeric
notes_for_agent: Focus on accounting concepts, the accounting equation, and basic recording transactions.
Include double-entry principles, T-accounts, ledger postings.
Test understanding of capital vs revenue expenditure.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 2 – Assets & Adjustments
notes_for_agent: Cover inventory valuation (FIFO, AVCO), accruals, and prepayments.
Include non-current asset calculations (depreciation, carrying value).
Test year-end adjustments and their impact on financial statements.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 3 – Corrections & Statements
notes_for_agent: Focus on impairment, error types, and trial balance corrections.
Include questions on suspense accounts and which errors affect TB.
Test preparation of SPL and SFP from adjusted trial balance.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 4 – Analysis & Partnerships
notes_for_agent: Cover financial ratios (current, gross margin, net margin, gearing).
Include partnership accounting (profit sharing, capital accounts).
Test share capital concepts (ordinary vs preference shares).

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 5 – Cash Flow & Records
notes_for_agent: Focus on cash flow statement preparation (indirect method).
Include bank reconciliation and control account reconciliation.
Test incomplete records and missing figure calculations.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 6 – Advanced Accounting
notes_for_agent: Cover suspense accounts, asset revaluation, disposal calculations.
Include dividend distributions, bonus/rights issues.
Test ethical principles and professional conduct scenarios.

mini_tests.title: FA Mini Test 7 – Specialist Topics
notes_for_agent: Focus on consignment accounting, agency relationships.
Include revenue recognition principles (IFRS 15 basics).
Test lease accounting, provisions, and contingent liabilities.

mock_exams.title: FA Mock Exam 1 – Comprehensive Coverage
notes_for_agent: Balanced mix across all 30 units with heavier weight on foundations.
Ensure representation from each major topic area.
Include mix of conceptual, calculation, and application questions.

mock_exams.title: FA Mock Exam 2 – Problem Areas Focus
mock_exams.format: MCQ-only with emphasis on commonly challenging topics
notes_for_agent: Heavier emphasis on adjustments, error correction, and reconciliations.
Include challenging ratio analysis and cash flow scenarios.
Test advanced topics like revaluation, provisions, and revenue recognition.
